channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats 'doomed to fail' without populist economic message, Warren warns
item.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren warns Democrats against courting wealthy donors, arguing party must focus on working people to win 2026 midterms and beyond.

item.title: Breaking: Mark Kelly Sues Pete Hegseth
House Republican calls for hearing after deadly ICE shooting in Minneapolis
item.description: Minneapolis shooting by ICE agent sparks political firestorm as Republicans defend federal law enforcement while Democrats demand operations cease.

item.title: House Democrats ask judge to block Noem’s revived ICE visit rule, say DHS defied court order
item.description: Democrats asked a federal judge to convene an emergency hearing to evaluate a new DHS directive that restricts them from accessing ICE facilities.

item.title: Delegate-heavy New York moves to shake up voting primary schedule, chasing 'influence'
item.description: Empire State Sen. James Skoufis is aiming for New York to hold its presidential primaries on Super Tuesday during the 2028 White House election cycle.

item.title: Report: ICE Agent Tied to Minneapolis Shooting in Hiding
item.description: The Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent linked to last week's fatal shooting of Renee Good has gone into hiding, the Daily Mail reported.

item.title: White House Smokes DNC Chair's Despicable Take on ICE and Iran
